title: Explain change in the antebellum economy

content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly describe ONE specific historical change in the United States economy between 1800 and 1848. Briefly describe ONE specific historical effect of changes in the United States economy between 1800 and 1848. Briefly explain how ONE specific historical development between 1800 and 1848 addressed the impact of changes in the United States economy.

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Answer (a), (b), and (c). skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
